title: Miley Cyrus Announces Engagement to Musician Maxx Morando
summary: Miley Cyrus, a three-time Grammy-winning pop star, has publicly confirmed her engagement to musician Maxx Morando, her partner of four years. The announcement was made during an interview on Good Morning America, where Cyrus revealed that Morando proposed during a recent trip to Asia, surprising her despite her tendency to control situations. She was seen wearing a gold and diamond engagement ring at the premiere of Avatar: Fire and Ash in Los Angeles. Cyrus, previously married to actor Liam Hemsworth from 2018 to 2019, met Morando on a blind date in 2023. Morando is a drummer for the LA-based band Liily, which performed on Cyrus's New Year's Eve show in 2022. In the interview, Cyrus expressed how Morando has supported her personal growth and emphasized the importance of having a supportive partner. Additionally, she discussed her latest song featured in the Avatar film and her decision to avoid touring due to challenges with maintaining sobriety and mental health on the road.
